Summary Note:
Hansen Madsen Møller and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Copenhagen. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Hansen Madsen Møller is a 45 year old Investment Director from Denmark.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Hansen Madsen Møller and Emilie have been married since 2009. Together they have 3 kids called Lykke, Amanda and Thomsen.
Education Background:
Hansen obtained his secondary school diploma from Frederikshavn Gymnasium in 1997.
Hansen completed his university studies at University College Lillebælt in 2003.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 22 years, Hansen Madsen Møller has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Hansen Madsen Møller's first role was as a Analyst at Advent International Danmark A/S, where he worked diligently from 2003 to 2007 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2007, he moved to KKR & Co. Danmark A/S to work as a Associate, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
His tenure as a Investment Director at Axcel Management A/S from 2011 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 3000000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns house in Aarhus, where he resides. It is worth 1711000 DKK.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns townhouse in Kolding worth 1240000 DKK.

On top of that he inherited a beautiful flat in Silkeborg, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 1060000 DKK.
He inherited a significant sum of 1660000 DKK from his grandfather, a respected Oil and Gas Executive, in 2013, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Hansen has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
